text: Ștefan Tașnadi (Hungarian: István Tasnádi, 21 March 1953 – 28 February 2018) was a Romanian heavyweight weightlifter.Ștefan Tașnadi . Romanian Olympic Committee He won a silver medal at the 1984 Olympics. He was born in Cluj, Romania. Tașnadi took up lifting in 1970 at a sports school and from 1976 to 1984 was a member of the national team. He retired in 1984 to become a weightlifting coach. Tașnadi died on 28 February 2018 in Cluj Napoca at the age of 65.Elhunyt Tasnádi István kolozsvári súlyemelő olimpikon ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Romanian weightlifters Category:Olympic silver medalists for Romania
title: Ștefan Tașnadi
